text: James "Jimmi" Harkishin (born Rajan Harkinshindas; 19 March 1965) is an English actor, best known for portraying the role of Dev Alahan in the ITV soap opera Coronation Street, which he has played continuously since 10 November 1999. He also had a small role in the film East is East, as well as Bhaji on the Beach. Harkishin played Gary Lobo in the Jonathan Creek episode "Danse Macabre". Harkishin was born in Paris, France, to an Indian father, Deepak, and an Italian mother, Soni."Sad News for Jimmi Harkishin", 22 April 2011. Accessed 13 February 2013 He began acting in 1987 under the stage name James Harkishin, and played the regular character of Jose Cuervo for 18 episodes between 1990â€“1993 in the children's TV series Uncle Jack. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:Soap opera actors Category:Actors from Paris
